zombies.descrip: With high morale and no trace of fatigue, Foot Soldiers consider it an honor to serve in the ongoing siege upon Neighborville’s brains.

skins.obtencion: Fall Festival prize map, costs 20 bulbs.

skins.obtencion: Summer Nights prize map

skins.obtencion: Summer Nights prize map completion reward
